name: Hung Out To Dry
description:
You are about to go on a date, but before you can go, you have to choose your outfit. And your outfits want to tell their own tales...

Hung Out To Dry is a short, emotive visual novel that tells the story of a young woman through the eyes of her clothes.

It was made in Unity, using the Fungus plugin.

Controls:

Left-click or space bar to progress dialogue.

Left click on objects or menu boxes to select

Postmortem:

https://hannahvardey.medium.com/hung-out-to-dry-a-postmortem-d1371de1c7da

Additional Credits:

Music from https://www.freesfx.co.uk/Category/Music-Tracks/194
